result.reason: Useful feature to quickly inject credentials or text into active sessions, improving workflow for systems without clipboard integration.
result.approach: Add 'Type Password' and 'Type Clipboard' items to ConnectionContextMenu. In handlers, retrieve the active ProtocolBase from OpenConnections, call Focus(), and use SendKeys.SendWait() to inject the password or clipboard text (escaping special characters as needed).
